reviewText: I bought this to do daily excercizing and the exercises are great.  However, there is about 4 minutes of talking before starting the exercises and there is no interactive menu to skip this part and get straight to the exercises.  Everyday, I have to fast forward through all the talking to get started with the exercises.  If this DVD is ever re-done, please keep this in mind for persons who are actually using this on a daily basis and provide interactive menus so that we can choose the exercise session only.

Suzanne's high energy gets you up and moving!  Her exercises are simple, fun and effective with no expensive equipment required.  This DVD is even great for staying in shape while on vacation.  You owe it to yourself and your body will thank you!

This DVD is a must have for anyone who needs to exercise but feels that they can't afford a gym membership, don't have the time or are simply shy about exercising in front of others.  Suzanne brings fun and functional fitness to YOU, right in your own home.  You'll have so much fun that you will forget you are actually exercising and doing something good for your body!

Suzanne Andrews, Occupational Therapy Practitioner and Host of Functional Fitness with over 25 years of exercise education experience, guides you with this fun, easy to follow workout that boosts circulation, helps decrease diabetes complications and boosts your energy. You have a choice of two workouts AND you also choose your exercise level either seated or standing. To complete the program, you also receive a 30 minute episode with 3 Doctors discussing the causes, symptoms and treatment for diabetes.Diabetes
